item.title: Eberly-Wódkiewicz spectrum for the _f_-deformed quantum oscillator
item.description: Introduction $$ \begin{equation} \hat{H} = \frac{\omega_{c}}{2}\left(\hat{A}^{\dagger}\hat{A} + \hat{A}\hat{A}^{\dagger}\right) \end{equation} $$ with $\hat{A} = \hat{a} f(\hat{n})$. Correlation function Spectrum

item.title: Linearizing a quadratric Hamiltonian using squeezing transformation
